entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -13.0°C
Wind: NNW 30 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:23 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning late in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:23 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:23 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
